Package org.nbena.beersmanager.exe

This package contains the two classes necessary to the "runtime".

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Utils
    Utils contains a range of utilities methods, that logically are not a part of other classes.
    Utils.Constants  

Package org.nbena.beersmanager.exe Description

This package contains the two classes necessary to the "runtime". A launcher class, and a class that contains utilities.
